alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 03 at 1:12AM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lower Keys in Monroe County through 145 AM EDT... At 112 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cudjoe Key to near Boca Grande Key. Movement was south southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Key West, Boca Chica, Big Coppitt Key, Boca Chica Channel Bridge, Niles Channel Bridge, Spanish Harbor Channel Bridge, Saddlebunch Keys, Geiger Key, Sunset Key and Boca Grande Key. This includes US 1 between mile markers 0 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
